author: Michele Meyer
title: Why Super Bowl Stars Will Stay at Houston's Hotel Derek (And Why Drake Rapped About It)
text:
Jeff Kravitz/AMA2016/FilmMagic Drake attends the 2016 American Music Awards at Microsoft Theater on Nov. 20, 2016 in Los Angeles. What lures Diddy, Justin Timberlake, One Direction, the Jonas Brothers & Cameron Diaz to a hotel named after an imaginary British rocker? 
The best Houston Super Bowl star-gazing may be at the opulent yet urbane Hotel Derek , just across busy I-610 from the state’s largest mall, the Galleria. The Derek itself is a rock star: sexy, sleek and the place to preen and be seen. Ciara got engaged here -- Instagramming her 15-carat rock -- while Drake is so enraptured he’s rapped about it. So why do they care? 
SWEET SUITES: 
A rolling wardrobe rack and purple calla lilies greeted a superstar who arrived midweek at one of two 1,200-square-foot penthouses. Mid-Century modernists Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams dressed both, as well as TV’s The Good Wife sets, but a shower big enough for six was what enticed Shaquille O’Neal. All 312 rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows and sexy snakeskin printed loos. Six concept suites -- with funky fleece chairs and psychedelic wallpaper -- would have Austin Powers exclaiming “Oh, behave!” A photo posted by HOTEL DEREK (@thehotelderek) on Oct 19, 2016 at 3:22pm PDT 

BEST DISH: 
En route from airports, celebs have ordered Derek’s burger, topped with pimento cheese and housemade pickles. A photo posted by HOTEL DEREK (@thehotelderek) on Oct 27, 2016 at 3:21pm PDT 

The Uptown Manhattan is a twist on tradition, with housemade ginger liqueur. A photo posted by HOTEL DEREK (@thehotelderek) on Nov 7, 2016 at 2:16pm PST 

ULTIMATE AMENITY: 
Evoking Fifty Shades of Grey , the hotel will cover beds with pillows and boxing gloves. “You’re free to let your inner-child out,” says marketing director Stephanie Summerall. “And once you’re exhausted, we send up milk and warm chocolate chip cookies.” A photo posted by HOTEL DEREK (@thehotelderek) on Aug 10, 2016 at 9:33am PDT 

POSH PUPPY PERKS: 
Those barking mad for pampered pooches will love Derek’s doggy delights, including a bandana, organic treats made of cage-free chicken or wagyu beef and veggies and the off-leash outdoor Wag Lounge, with its fire hydrant and Astroturf (a home-grown invention). A photo posted by HOTEL DEREK (@thehotelderek) on Jun 5, 2016 at 3:33pm PDT 

PAP-FREE PRIVACY: 
Key access is limited to one’s own floor and famed faces can slip in discreetly via two entrances: one hidden, the other with a valet area that can be draped. Says Summerall, “Discretion is of the utmost importance.” 
2525 West Loop South, hotelderek.com .
